sections.heading: Cancellation of mortgages and privileges from the recordsThe recorder shall cancel a mortgage or privilege from his records in the manner prescribed by law
sections.text: Acts 1992, No. 1132, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 1993; Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง2, eff. July 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, eff. Nov. 29, 2005.
